snippet: One of the more sibilant names in American art belongs to the 19th-century landscape artist William Trost Richards.
lead_paragraph: One of the more sibilant names in American art belongs to the 19th-century landscape artist William Trost Richards.

headline.main: Stroke by Stroke, He Nailed Arcadia
headline.print_headline: Stroke by Stroke, He Nailed Arcadia
